user_question: What are the latest advancements in wearable health technology and can you generate an image of a futuristic health smartwatch?
final_answer: Latest advancements in wearable health technology include continuous glucose monitoring, advanced ECG features, and AI-driven health insights. Image of a futuristic health smartwatch generated. New wearable devices for mental health monitoring include mood tracking wristbands and EEG headbands for stress management.
